name: 2024 6th International Conference on Intelligent Medicine and Image Processing
content: Publication: Since 2019, IMIP papers have been published in conference proceedings, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus. Full papers accepted by IMIP 2024 can be published in Conference Proceedings, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, and submitted to be reviewed by CPCI or Journal of Image and Graphics (JOIG, ISSN: 2301-3699), which will be included in Scopus, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, etc.
